column4: hey all, i installed ubuntu 10.10 without any problems, very nice, thank you, however: I changed the button layout in the titlebar using the corresponding key via gconf-editor, however, metacity ignores my new settings - so how can i change the layout?
that does not work for me, Dr_Willis
and i think i didn't do anything diffrent by firing up gconf-editor, did i?
theres some tools that let you tweak them also with a gui. Ubuntu-tweak is one such tool
